name: A Single Choice on a Fateful Day
name_original: A Single Choice on a Fateful Day
description:
Your plans got cancelled on your day off. Now you have to find something to do. Today is your lucky day since the universe is going to give you a lot of other choices. You need to decide which choice you are going to pick, but you can only pick one.

This is my first game, so I hope you enjoy it!
